channel.title: CVE Feed for CESNET -- perun
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CESNET -- perun

item.title: CVE-2020-5281|2024-08-04T08:22:09.083Z -- cesnet -- perun
item.description: In Perun before version 3.9.1, VO or group manager can modify configuration of the LDAP extSource to retrieve all from Perun LDAP. Issue is fixed in version 3.9.1 by sanitisation of the input.
